name: ctrlhub
description: Control Systems Education Platform with Hybrid Architecture

scripts.stop: pkill -f 'python main.py' 2>/dev/null || true && pkill -f 'npm start' 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -Pi :8003 -sTCP:LISTEN -t 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -Pi :3000 -sTCP:LISTEN -t 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean: npm run stop && rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/build && rm -rf ctrlhub_env
scripts.setup: python3 -m venv ctrlhub_env && source ctrlhub_env/bin/activate && pip install -r local_agent/requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install

author: Piyush Tiwari
